```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(glue)
library(here)
```



```{r}
dfs_stu_qqq <- tibble(
  years = seq(2000, 2018, 3)
) %>%
  mutate(
  paths = glue("Data/Output/{years}/{what}.rds", what = "stu_qqq")
)


list_of_dfs <- here(dfs_stu_qqq$paths) %>%
  map(read_rds)


walk(list_of_dfs, glimpse)
```
